strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Watch today's most popular YouTube videos
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
YouTube Copyright 2008 Google Inc. Watch today's most popular YouTube videos. Right-click the gadget to select a video feed, or use the search box to find videos.
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
This gadget was created by Google and is maintained by the open-source community http://code.google.com/p/google-youtube-gadget/
strings.FLASH_REQUIRED: This gadget requires the latest Flash Player.
strings.INSTALL_FLASH: Click here to download and install the Adobe Flash Player.

VIDEO_VIEW_COUNT.desc: The number of times a video has been viewed

VIEWERS.desc: Total number of views of a youtube video

FEATURED.desc: Featured videos on YouTube menu item

MOST_VIEWED.desc: Most viewed videos on YouTube menu item

MOST_DISCUSSED.desc: Most discussed videos on YouTube menu item

TOP_FAVORITED.desc: Top favourite videos on YouTube menu item

strings.NO_EMBED: Please visit YouTube to watch this video
